title: [Season Finale] August 15th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: [Season Finale] August 15th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Anne Heche, Viral CEO linkedin post, Britney Spears vs. Kevin Federline, Kardashian family update,  Millie Bobby Brown,  + Jennette McCurdy's Memoir
description:
We're closing out season 1 strong with our last BBQ! We reflect on how far we've come this year and what we've got planned for our upcoming second season. Though we're gearing up for an 8 week hiatus ( we promise it'll go by quickly!), this week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from an overview of the Anne Heche tragedy to discussing all the drama surrounding Britney Spears and Keven Federline's ongoing public fight. See below for the topics of the week:



Anne Heche

  • Anne Heche: Accident overview + suffering brain injury and not expected to survive


Viral CEO

  • This CEO Is Going Viral On LinkedIn For Posting A Selfie While Crying After Laying People Off, And People Have Verrrry Strong Feelings About It


Britney Spears versus Kevin Federline

  • Overview of the feud between Britney and Kevin + drama with her kids


Kardashian Family Update

  • Khloe’s custody arrangement for baby son with cheating ex Tristan revealed


Millie Bobby Brown

  • Millie Bobby Brown Says She's "Healing" After She Was "Publicly Humiliated" by a TikTok Creator


Jennette McCurdy's Memoir

  • The Biggest Bombshells from Jennette McCurdy's Memoir, 'I'm Glad My Mom Died'




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
